data.name: Moon Split Island
data.detailed_description:
What is Moon Split Island?

Moon Split Island is an open-world adventure game. Explore the island, climb steep slopes, and explore deep canyons. Find mysterious treasures and discover passages to the underworld.


About the Game


Moon Split Island is constantly ravaged by earthquakes. An ancient legend tells of the awakening of a strange creature in the depths of the island. The inhabitants ask you to investigate, but they are not entirely truthful. Find out what is really going on and put an end to it.

Exploration | Explore the island


All over the island, you can find puzzles, quests, items, and treasures. All you have to do is look in the right place and have the right items.

Dungeons | Dive into the adventure


Danger lurks below the surface. Find the hidden entrances to the underworld and embark on numerous adventures - but be properly equipped or you won't get far.

Co-op | Joint Adventure


Moon Split Island can be played alone or in pairs. In pairs, you share equipment and find out who is more skilled with a sword and who with a bow and arrow.




Inspired by:
Zelda
A Short Hike
My Time at Portia
Stranded Sails

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2,3 Ghz - 2 Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 / 2,0 GHz - 4 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
